price: (Asomafoͻ no) kaa sε: “Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn Nim yie sε, nokorε, yεyε Asomafoͻ ma mo,
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
